players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is dead. This is terrible. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager and I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share any information you have."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and he's guilty."
Charlie: "That's a bold claim, Alice. If you're the detective, why would you investigate me first instead of someone more suspicious? It doesn't add up."

Diana: "I'm really shaken by Bob's death. Alice is accusing Charlie, but Charlie has a point. If Alice is the detective, why would she investigate Charlie so early? It makes me wonder if Alice is trying to frame Charlie. We need to be careful and..."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafioso. Diana, trust me. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. If she were the real detective, she would have investigated Diana or me first, not a random player. She's trying to frame me to hide her own guilt. Diana, don't be fooled."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
